A

An abstract Algorithm implementation to be extended by the concrete strategies.

getScore(String) - Method in class com.stoyanr.mastermind.AbstractIOPlayer
First prints a message to the output device to ask the user for a score, and then reads two integer numbers from the input device, first for the "cows" and then for the "bulls".
getScore(String) - Method in class com.stoyanr.mastermind.DefaultPlayer

getWinningScore() - Method in class com.stoyanr.mastermind.Mastermind
Returns the winning score for the current game setup, that is a score with 0 cows and length bulls.
GuessCalculator - Class in com.stoyanr.mastermind
A performance optimization facility which calculates and stores the guesses made by a particular algorithm for a given game setup, for up to a predefined number of game rounds (or "levels").
GuessCalculator(Mastermind, AlgorithmFactory, int) - Constructor for class com.stoyanr.mastermind.GuessCalculator
Creates a new guess calculator for the specified game setup, algorithm, and levels.

H

hasGuesses(int) - Method in class com.stoyanr.mastermind.GuessCalculator
Returns true if the calculator has precalculated guesses for the specified level (game round), which is the case if this level is lower than the calculator levels.
